Adult/immature.description: Black Swifts are entirely blackish below and do not have a white throat and chest like White-throated Swifts. They also have a shorter tail than White-throated Swifts.

Adult male.description: Swallows have shorter, less curved and more triangular-shaped wings than swifts. Violet-green Swallows have entirely white underparts while White-throated Swifts have dark bellies.
